website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling set of silicone stretch lids that are durable and work well for a number of pots, bowls, glasses, and more.
pros: Strong, clear silicone lids in 7 versatile sizes that can fit everything from small glasses to large containers
Multiple tabs provide a good grip when putting them in place
cons: Difficult to stretch over some containers
Lids sometimes slip off containers while in the refrigerator

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the other ones I bought!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is much better than 3 other sets of silicon lids I previously bought on Amazon. And the thought they even put into the packaging and overall presentation doesn't go unnoticed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Addict

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of using less plastic wrap but these are frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: We love the concept of these. But we’ve found that they are hard to wrestle into a bowl. And once they are secured, it seems that whatever we’re storing has some kind of moisture in it which eventually makes the silicone lids slide right off. Recently I covered leftover coleslaw and the next day, the lid had popped off.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing practical easy to used reusable lids...10/10
customer_reviews.text: I love these new silicon stretch lids they have transformed my fridge and keeps my food fresh. Before I found these reusable lids my fridge was a complete disorganised mess of half wrapped plates, so much food wastage and plastics used. My fridge is now clean, food stays fresh for longer and the best part is that I because there are 7 different sizes that fit ANY shaped bowl, pan, container there is always one that fits. These are so easy to clean. I would highly recommend these to anyone and will be giving them as gifts to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Better than any wraps out there.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because the material is thin and very flexible. It is stretchier than any other similar wraps out there. Also it has a size that can be used for a standard dinner plate, but a small size that is useful for leftover cat food cans and infant milk bottles. The variation in size is what makes this product very useful for me. Finally, it comes with a cotton mesh bag, super cute, and easy to just hang it somewhere in your kitchen, once you wash your wrap, which keeps the wrap dried and sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Arai

customer_reviews.title: Fits all sorts of shapes
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to try my new lids on various tubs as I had heard they were great. Just yesterday I had a large rectangular tub full of marshmallows which I needed to cover. I went for the cling wrap but then thought of my new silicone lids - the second largest ROUND lid fit beautifully over a large RECTANGULAR lid, all spill proof and everything. I am absolutely delighted by these lids. The quality is brilliant, they are going to last for such a long time. I also love my little net bag and the sturdy beautiful fastener on it which can be used for so many other things apart from just holding your lids!
customer_reviews.author: Annette L.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best in the industry!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, they work beautifully, and the safety it the best you can get: European grade, top standard, 100% platinum silicone. I love this product and after the company’s prompt response to me about some questions I had, I also love this company. It’s a great feeling to know there are reputable companies and people out there who care! This is a top notch product made by knowledgeable people who care about the environment and YOUR health as well!
customer_reviews.author: Green Mamma

customer_reviews.title: so useful
customer_reviews.text: No more plastic wrap or aluminum foil! I am slowly replacing everything with reusable silicon! These lids are pretty awesome. They are stretchy and fit over my pyrex and my funny sized deep pie dish with handles. And my instant pot. And my weird bowls with the fluted sides. You can put them in the freezer/oven/microwave and use on really hot things. SO PERFECT. Super easy to wash, too!
customer_reviews.author: kimberlyt

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, these are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. These are kinda sticky (just have that feel) so they are hard to clean. Food stays stuck on the product. Hard to stretch on different containers. They feel like they are good quality but I haven't had good luck with them
customer_reviews.author: Erin J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Concept but much TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I hoped the XL would fit over my bread bowl and large salad bowl. Although they may stretch, there isn't enough to actually stay on the bowl. XL does not even come close to stretching to a usable size to cover an 11" bowl. Silicone material is nice and the dry bag is good. But these are simply not big enough. Not a good value would not recommend. I would have returned them but didn't want to hassle with mailing etc. Thought I would use them on smaller bowls but they are not as described and will only use them on small bowls. Smaller sizes will never be useful.
customer_reviews.author: MissyM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work after a couple washes
customer_reviews.text: At first these worked ok. But after washing them a few times I can’t get them to work. Slip right off. Worthless at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint: nowhere are we forewarned that hot food has to be completely cold before placing in the refrigerator. This limits its usefulness because I can’t always wait at home for containers to cool before refrigerating. In the case of a large bowl, it could take over an hour which would invite bacteria to form.
customer_reviews.author: Art aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Non-useable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on the high ratings it received. However, these silicon covers are not for me: I could not get them to fit over the bowls, none of the sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Centuries Seamstress

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use and fit few things..
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these because the sizes fit limited items and it's useless for covering most plates in the microwave, as it lays on top of the food. The sizes don't work for me because they're either too big or too small and not easy to stretch over containers. The only one I found to be of much use is the can-sized lid. I use it frequently to cover opened cans of wet dog food. However, they do appear durable and easy to clean. Just worthless for my primary goal of covering plates/bowls to be microwaved.
customer_reviews.author: Deane B.

customer_reviews.title: Good concept but just doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these covers but a lot of what I wanted to use it for, like casserole dishes, just isn't suited for these silicone covers. They slide off every time because there is either moisture or grease on the outside. These covers just won't stick to it. For totally dry, and clean containers they probably would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Houser

customer_reviews.title: I really like these!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I have old plastic Tupperware bowls that are missing lids and these work great for them. The also work well for my other various round glass bowls that don’t have lids. Much better than trying to use Saran Wrap or foil. No, they won’t keep liquid in if the bowl is knocked over. But neither would Saran Wrap or foil. And this way there is no waste. I wash them in the top rack of the dishwasher and they seem to be holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: s&f,proud of that

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect much
customer_reviews.text: I like that I am able to cover dishes that do not have lids any longer and these fit odd-shaped containers. Downsides are they are not too sturdy as one has already ripped and also another annoying thing is that you may put them on a container at room temp, but once it goes in the fridge and gets cold and moist the lid slips off and will not reattach. Buy them with this in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to reduce single use plastic in our house hold for a couple of years now. The other day I got boned because I wanted to reheat something in the microwave but you can't use beeswax wraps or foil and I had NO Saran Wrap. I resort to a damp papertowel, which was not the best. So I hoped on Amazon and found these little things. So far so good. When my kids don't finish their can of soda, there is a size for that. So far there has been a size to fit over every bowl and plate we have. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JC Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, cover any size bowl tightly!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy these sooner? Save the world from more discarded plastic wrap, and you'll also be saving money over time not having to buy it! The covers look a little 'odd', at first ... but then you use them and realize that the circular rings help you put the cover onto the bowl evenly, while the tabs make the cover easy to remove. Perfect weight silicone that stretches and conforms to any shape bowl or container, even those that have a pouring spout/lip. Excellent product and design! HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Patisserie

customer_reviews.title: Work well on containers where food is not higher than the rim - not plates
customer_reviews.text: Nice & stretchy, fit well over cans, jars, bowls. Appreciate the tabs to save my fingernails. The containers need to be deep enough so that food is not higher than the rim. Alas, these do not work over dinner plates (where the food is higher than the rim). Washed in the dishwasher - top rack, air dry - & they came out perfect. Haven't tried whether they are leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: JudyinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Will keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to get on, too easy to inadvertently slip off. Also absorbed/retained the smell of my stew and had to toss. Did not live up to the name: wasted money and effort.
customer_reviews.author: EnJay

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I liked them until, I was cleaning it and my finger went through it.
customer_reviews.author: D McJohnson

customer_reviews.title: So many issues.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this item. Not leak proof- i covered some cut watermelon, juice got all over the inside of my cooler. Not so easy to wash- theyre extremely floppy, finding a way for them to be washed and dry thoroughly in the dishwasher is tricky. Haven’t been successful yet. Lids pop off!- if your bowl doesnt have a lip ( sometimes even when it does), lid may slowly pop off by itself. Hard to use- yes they stretch, but its a struggle to stretch them over bowls. Ive almost spilled everything many times.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ho

customer_reviews.title: Happy to reduce waste by using these covers!
customer_reviews.text: I know some people said that this would not stick to a bowl. The bowl just has to be dry. If there’s any moisture on it just dry it off in the lid sticks great. I’m really happy to be using this more often, and less plastic wrap. It doesn’t work for everything, but it works on enough items to make a difference and I don’t feel like I’m being so wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: FGraceS

customer_reviews.title: Not a sustainable option if they don't last
customer_reviews.text: Barely had these a couple months and they're already tearing, had to throw one out. I was exited to replace single-use plastics but they don't last long enough to actually be eco-friendly. Also, I found that unless the bowl was 100% dry and had a lip, I spent more time swearing than enjoying the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liking These More Than Plastic Wrap
customer_reviews.text: We got tired of plastic wrap that didn't work well or are a "lifetime supply" we don't want to store. These easy to use & because they're dish-washer safe, no effort to clean. Storage is simple too since they're flexible so fit easily in whatever spaces that are available. We've had some funny moments trying to fit (forcing?) one on a square/rectangle dish which only tells me it's time to order more shapes!
customer_reviews.author: Zalea

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: These silicon covers are a great addition to my kitchen and have greatly diminished my use of plastic wrap and disposable constainers. My husband finds them difficult to use..........maybe because he has fat fingers and big hands? I have arthritis in my hands but have no trouble stretching them to fit over all of my bowls. I love them and would recommend them. In fact, I may buy more in additional sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jane

customer_reviews.title: Bought to seal older cannisters
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these. I have a beautiful set of older pottery canisters that were not designed with a seal. These pull nicely over the canister lid to keep flour and sugar fresh. Easy to clean too! But the best part is that I'm using the extra lids as covers for leftovers when I put things in the fridge. Be sure that the outside of the container is dry or you will not get a tight seal!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne S

customer_reviews.title: id love more of the middle size, but these are great
customer_reviews.text: we are slowly changing over to no plastic wrap so these were our first purchase. id like to see if they make more of the middle/average bowl size but there is a great variety included here. there is even one for small/tiny bowls that we use to fit over cans of food we dont finish. keeps things fresh. takes getting used to, but its lowering our footprint so we are getting use to it. i recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Does not do the job
customer_reviews.text: Too difficult to put on. A waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexguy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to using these & not having to use plastic wrap. Unfortunately, once they are in the refrigerator & you take them off you can't get them back on due to condensation. I tried wiping the bowl but it didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: utterly frustrating
customer_reviews.text: use a lid that's smaller than the bowl and it fights so hard against being stretched, and is so slimy and slippery, that you spend forever trying to get it to stay on and aren't confident it WILL stay on left overnight in the fridge. use the very next size up and it sits loose and flabby over the bowl, not airtight at all. you, or at least i, would be better off just resting a plate over the top. waste of effort and money.
customer_reviews.author: Daithi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great Alternative
customer_reviews.text: The assortment of sizes is perfect for every glass and bowl in my cupboard and is a fabulous alternative to plastic wrap. It seals well and removes easily. They also clean very quickly and the storage bag keeps them all together when not in use. They nest so they take up very little space. I'm very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Overall good with one reservation
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put on stainless steel bowl if there is any moisture at all on bowl. The instructions do state that the vessel and lid should be dry before applying but that means it is difficult to reattach the lid on a container that comes out of the fridge due to moisture from condensation.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Really work!
customer_reviews.text: These work. I haven't tried them on any unusually shaped bowls, but they worked on my round Pyrex bowls. I did have some difficulty stretching them on, but "practice makes perfect"!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works great
customer_reviews.text: These are great items to have on hand, pop one over a cup, bowl, dish, small plate, whatever your leftovers are already on or in- no additional dishes to dirty up! The stretchy material clings, too. I tested with liquid upside-down, no problem, no leak. Greasy or oily food I think might make it slippery and not stick as well. Easy to wash and dry and put away. Great replacements for all those glass storage dishes that came with their own plastic lids but the glass has outlasted the plastic. Great in the microwave, leave a corner open for venting. The set of seven is plenty for my needs. Glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these lids
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first - but tried them on all my bowls and even turn the bowls upside down with water in them to test for leaks - these are wonderful! Easy to store - comes with a mesh bag to store them in and they work exactly as stated. No more rummaging around to find the exact lid - these are incredibly versatile. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I was first hesitant since there were reviews about them ripping. I’ve used them on bowls that they fit perfectly, and bowls that they barely fit and they work just fine. They’ve never slipped off because of moisture. They collect water in the dishwasher so it’s better to just wash by hand, which isn’t hard. The only thing is you can’t stack bowls. I’m just happy to replace the plastic lids my dad burnt in the microwave.. and they’re plastic free!
customer_reviews.author: V. D.

customer_reviews.title: A KITCHEN NECESSITY!
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me then you've got plenty of Tupperware but not many lids to match! Easily one of the most frustrating things to have to deal with when trying to pack food to put away. I bought these and could not be more happy! It comes with plenty of different sizes to fit over any size bowl or container. Each cover is ribbed so it can stretch if need be! Super useful and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: fatima

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to use as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed as the lids can be quite hard to put on the dish. The dish has to be relatively close fit for the lid to work well - i.e. not as stretchy as the description would make you believe. If the lid needs to be stretched some, the dish has to have some kind of a lip for the lid to stay on. If you get anything greasy on the lid while trying to put it on, just forget it. Even if you stretch it, it will slide right off. You need to wash with soap first to even try again.
customer_reviews.author: Just a mom

customer_reviews.title: Great way to reduce waste!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I use them as bowl covers in the fridge or in place of plastic wrap cover in the microwave (make sure to vent a corner) They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food stays fresh
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom because she saw an ad about em. She says they work great! She doesn’t have to buy a ton of baggies anymore because all she has to do is cover it with one of these and it stay fresh! Easy too clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Nice silicone lids
customer_reviews.text: In the short time I have been using these, they have performed well. Following the instructions, I made sure the container was dry and oil free before putting on the lid and it stayed on well. In one case, after I opened the container the next day and tried to put the lid back on, it did slip but it was hard to get the cold container completely dry. I like the size assortment and am very happy with these lids and the storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: L. V.

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my containers
customer_reviews.text: These silicone covers are great. They fit all my containers and I can microwave with them on. One thing I wish it had was some kind of marking on them. There are 7 of them and I'd like to be able to identify them by size so I can easily grab the one I need for the bowl I use.
customer_reviews.author: mmateik

customer_reviews.title: Very, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to use these instead of throwaway plastic wrap, but this stuff failed the very first time I used it. I had a room-temperature, dry bowl with some watermelon cubes in it and covered it with one of these covers just as instructed (used a size that was a couple of inches smaller than the top of the bowl and stretched it evenly across the opening). It was tight as a drum, and I was feeling pretty good about the purchase when I put it in the refrigerator. The next morning, however, the lid had completely slipped off. Very, very disappointed. If you can't use these things in the refrigerator, what good are they?
customer_reviews.author: Okapi

customer_reviews.title: Good value, well made.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set to a friend several weeks ago. I saw her yesterday and she was raving about it. I looked at it, and it’s much better than the other brand I bought for myself several months ago. My set was smaller and didn’t have the tabs around the edge, which would make putting them on a bowl so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: L. Link

customer_reviews.title: Fits #10 juice can!
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and will cover just about any container you might have. I needed something for #10 cans of juice and cola cans and these do a great job. You can evacuate the excess air when applying. And yes I have drastically reduced my use of stretch tight, than you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Love these lids!
customer_reviews.text: These lids are so easy to use and leak proof. Just know that when you take the lid off, if there is any condensation on the lid, before using to cover again, make sure to wipe the condensation off to that the lid will stay on well again.
customer_reviews.author: RNNP

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Good replacement!!
customer_reviews.text: I like these are reusable and reasonably easy to use. I’ve not yet actively used these but have tested it on one of the dishes I needed a replacement lid for. They stretch nicely to cover it and fit tightly. After I use them a few times I will have to update results. In the meantime they are a great replacement for the old cracked lids from my Pyrex dishes. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Flexible & includes larger lid
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect. These are not like what I normally think of as silicone. They are perfect for the prep & serve bowls I just got. They stretch to fit & include a 12" lid, which is the one I most needed. They arrived in just a few days & come with a mesh storage bag. They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Although they seemed like a good idea, I do not like these covers. Each size has a very limited range. I have only a few bowls that I can put food into & find a size that works. After spending 5 minutes & giving up on several (not quite big enough, or too big,) I have decided they need improvement.
customer_reviews.author: VELSTAR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to be Green
customer_reviews.text: So many great products now it’s easy to be green. This pack has multiple sizes. The smallest size is perfect for cans. I tried a couple of the larger sizes on melamine bowls and they are just as grippy. So if you are bringing a salad to a potluck these kids are perfect. If you have misplaced a lid for a Ball jar one of the smaller ones will be perfect and spill proof. I used one on a cream pitcher with a spout and while not spill proof it keeps the contents fresh. I’m very happy with them. I would suggest that this assortment come with more than one the smallest size since that size is super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic wrap madness is over, these are a win!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 for gifts and they have been a huge hit! No more plastic wrap waste and way less frustrating. It's a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Work so so. Better than using plastic wrap
customer_reviews.text: They cover the bowls well once you get them on which is sometimes difficult. When I put things in the refrigerator they sometimes come off
customer_reviews.author: B C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to put on any container that you have. There is a size of cover for everything and they nest together, which saves space. Not to mention that they are not plastic. Also, I put them in the top rack of my dishwasher and they come out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Nice for storing serving bowls in the frig
customer_reviews.text: These work well to store food in bowls with no lids. Serving bowl can be covered and go right to the frig. So far I’m washing them by hand; not so sure about putting them in the dishwasher even though the directions say it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: D. Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no waste.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for! They fit every container and bowl. I’m so happy w them. They are easy to use and they come w a nice cotton bag to store them in. No more plastic wrap needed. You can see through them so you know what you need to grab from the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile great product
customer_reviews.text: Great food covering for microwave & refrigerator. Very pleased and even my husband commented on the beefiness and strength of these coverings. Would highly recommend very much leakproof and no problems with these. Good price and received fairly quickly
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Better than average but not the best
customer_reviews.text: They are thicker and heavier than average (the ones with smiley faces). I have a set that is even thicker and heavier bought long ago. Unfortunately, the seller is no longer selling them and I have been on a quest to find equivalent quality ever since. These are close, though not quite as thick and heavy as the first set I bought. On with the search.
customer_reviews.author: Piu

customer_reviews.title: Very thin!
customer_reviews.text: Unpackaged and washed. Attempted to use for first time on a can and the lid ripped. The material is incredibly thin and not durable. I cannot see these lasting multiple uses. I really Wanted to like these!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Work pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat surprised how thin these are - I've only used 1 so far on a larger bowl over my fresh salsa. So far so good. I just hope they dont rip/tear with use b/c of how thin they are.
customer_reviews.author: Tylers Mom

customer_reviews.title: So, they're ok...
customer_reviews.text: Work great as long as bowls are dry, but the second bowls get a little bit of condensation they won't stay on, so don't plan on using on bowls that have been refrigerated. Overall easy to clean (we throw them in the dishwasher) and leakproof on dry bowls, but don't expect to be able to put them on any bowl that is even slightly damp.
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. H. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Only recommendation is to not try to fit them on too big a container. Wish there was a larger one in the set. I bought these for both my kids for Christmas...a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Paula P Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: It takes a minute to figure out how to put them on the bowls. But they work fine. I do wish there was a larger size. The biggest one in the set is maybe ten inches across?
customer_reviews.author: Ann Sligar

customer_reviews.title: Helping, in a small way, to protect the environment
customer_reviews.text: I feel good about starting to do a little more of my part in reducing waste helping to combat climate change. The lids are just what they say, easy to use, easy to clean and stretchy to fit various containers
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Great not using plastic wrap. Only gave them a 4 star as I can’t use all sizes with what I own. Getting them completely dry before storing can be a challenge. Like them well enough to encourage family members to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Cook

customer_reviews.title: Less plastic in my life....
customer_reviews.text: I always felt bad when I had to use plastic wrap to keep food fresh. So I was looking for an alternative. These silicone lids are exactly what I was looking for as an alternative. They stretch over the bowls easy and clean up is a breeze. And I don’t throw away plastic. It is another great green item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and comes with a nice bag for storage. only thing i wish was different is that if we could pick and choose the sizes, maybe two of a few of the same size as opposed to only one each. Never really use the smaller ones since it only fits a glass or small bowl.. like a condiment or dip bowl or something. the larger ones are the most useful
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coverup
customer_reviews.text: Some of the covers on my glass storage containers cracked and these work well to store leftovers in the containers to keep a lid on for freshness. These fit well and are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Firmani

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC! No more plastic wrap
customer_reviews.text: Lovely quality, super clingy and easy to get on/off. So much better than plastic wrap waste. Hope this company makes lots more products! Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Linda Herner

customer_reviews.title: These silicone lids are great!
customer_reviews.text: I had expected to like these stretchy silicon lids, but they really are versatile! I've found several ways to use them. In fact, just last night, I was thinking of ordering more!!! Thanks for a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Airtight seal and good sizes
customer_reviews.text: This package comes with the extra large size, which is so handy. These are great. Easy to clean and they seal tightly. I love that they are reusable.
customer_reviews.author: SandySTC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome invention!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. We just got them two days ago, but already have saved tons of saran wrap by using these to cover bowls and cups. They are thick, stretchy and easy to use and clean. I'm buying a set for my mom for Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Don't Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to eliminate using cling wrap to cover bowls, etc in the refrigerator. Very disappointing. Even though there are a number of sizes and they stretch (a little) they don't fit anything very well. If the lid is not big enough it won't work. The next size up that fits just sits on the top of the bowl and doesn't seal. The other issue is that if there is anything on the outside of the bowl the lid slips and won't stick. Sadly they were a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: A good alternative to Tupperware containers.
customer_reviews.text: The lids work on many of my bowls and are a valid alternative to Tupperware. They are about as leak proof as your average Tupperware as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Fregeau

customer_reviews.title: Stretchable Covers
customer_reviews.text: I ate Dinty Moore stew last night and didn't feel like eating leftovers tonight. I put the leftovers in this paper ice cream cup and labeled it. Then I put the stretchable cover on top. It fit perfectly and was so easy. I am really happy with these covers. Sue M.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the planet! Wife is impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: These should be great for us!, and the planet!! Just received these today, they are sturdy and should be easy to clean in the dishwasher. My wife is very impressed with these covers!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Trying to be more sensitive to recycling and the environment, I bought these thinking they would be used over and over. They are now in the landfill. Hard to get on, both top and bolw need to be clean and dry. Not sure what size they fit, high expectations not met. Off to find something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: These simply don’t work. I’ve finally thrown them out. They do not cover any bowl - snap/slide off almost immediately. So disappointing. We’ll continue to seek plastic alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: mom2b43

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought these a long time ago. I have basically eliminated plastic wrap use in my kitchen, using these to cover everything from open cans of beans to proofing bread dough to casserole dishes, and everything in between. They can be used on almost any shape container, and stay on far better than plastic wrap ever has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Learning curve.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I would return them. I bought them primarily because I needed a cat food can cover and a spare cover for a lid that had gotten mildewed. It took a few tries, and I was able to get things covered. I think they will work just fine if you follow their directions.
customer_reviews.author: Marbella

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace missing lids from some recently purchased glassware. Only problem I have is that the one tab to pull on is a bit long. Comes with tons of sizes and a free cotton net bag to make sure they stay dry.Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the lids of my Pyrex bowls are starting to crack. Unfortunately these did not cling very well or create a leak proof seal. They were kind of firm and not squishy so they slipped off the lip of the bowls instead of grabbing on. Too bad because it’s a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna P.

customer_reviews.title: Does not expand as it  claims
customer_reviews.text: I was exited to finally got rid of plastic wraps . Ordered this set mostly for my large bowls . But unfortunately the largest lid does not stretch to promised 12” , they go size in size so I’m returning
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Simon

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: My wife and i use these for leftovers, espeically when we just want to throw a whole pot/pan into the fridge. We slap one of these on top and it is easy to apply, seals tight, and keeps food fresh. We no longer use foil or beeswax, so we're saving on disposable items. Highly recommend, wish i had found these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: name6789

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I tried them
customer_reviews.text: I have just started using them and so far I am pleased. The silicone seems to be good quality and the lids are easy to put on and seal well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J. Mabrey

customer_reviews.title: From refrigerator to microwave!
customer_reviews.text: I was curious to see how these would work. I'm happy to say they worked as I had hoped - tight seal over bowls. When it was time to reheat the veggies, I unsealed one small area around the bowl and popped the it right in the microwave. Perfect splatter shield protection. Very nice product and no wrestling with plastic wrap! Maybe square shaped ones next?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not stretchy—you have to measure all of your bowls
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that it was stretchy and could accommodate different sizes. You pretty much had to have the exact size of all of the bowls in order for them to fit. I really wanted some thing that could accommodate different sizes for all of my bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: No waste
customer_reviews.text: It's great not to be polluting the environment with one use plastic. These are working fine and I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice to have for containers without lids, like small baking cups I use.
customer_reviews.author: Short4j

customer_reviews.title: Do not work as well as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for use in my travel trailer. They are lightweight and versatile. However, when I went to use them, would continue to slip off of the bowls. I could not keep them on, even when trying multiple sizes. I washed and dried the lids thinking that something might have been on them but it did not improve their ability to remain in place. I finally had to use aluminum foil. The bowls that I use in the travel trailer are plastic, so maybe that has something to do with it. Perhaps they would work better on glass containers, I'm not sure. A little disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret T.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to decrease the amount of foil I was using to cover bowls and food storage containers. They also work great on round food storage containers that have cracked. Less waste and less money on foil.
customer_reviews.author: Meggy

customer_reviews.title: bowl covers
customer_reviews.text: love these tight fit no leaks easy to clean food stays fresher and no odor
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I bought some for my mom and myself on a whim and was pleasantly surprised. My mom loves them and has now replaced all foil and Saran Wrap. With these. My mother in law came over and used mine and loved them too! So now I need to buy some for her.
customer_reviews.author: Aissa L. Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great storage covers!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great to not spend time looking for covers that actually fit storage bowls or have to use foil or plastic. These silicone covers are proving to be one of my favorite items ordered from Amazon. They are easy to wash and easy to put on and take off almost any size container. I highly recommend these covers.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L Haven

customer_reviews.title: One major flaw
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to come across this product and ordered it. I have a set of Pyrex glass bowls whose lids are failing due to age and use. The flaw was that due to its floppy nature and requirement to stretch, it is difficult to cover a full bowl of liquid. Re-closing the lid as I use up the liquid makes the task harder, as the lid stays wet.
customer_reviews.author: WannaBeAFan

customer_reviews.title: I always have a lid now!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered these and my only complaint is I’d like to have two of each size. I like that these come with a cotton mesh bag for storage so they don’t get mildew spots and it’s easier to keep them together. I’m definitely ordering a second set!
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Covers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best easy to use.. saves using Sarah wrapping...multiple sizes.. good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Winters

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to fit over cups but the handle gets in the way
customer_reviews.author: ToniGaye

customer_reviews.title: less waste
customer_reviews.text: I either lost or broke the lids to my glass bowls. These lids fit great and I don't have to use/throw away saran wrap. Perfoct for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN L SIMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them much yet, but they seem hard to get on, especially if you have arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Lesadenise

product_meta.title: unwasted Silicone Stretch Lids- Set of 7 Incl. Exclusive XL Size- Reusable & Versatile Silicon Covers- Fits Any Container or Bowl to Keep Food Fresh- Store & Reheat- Easy Clean- Bonus Storage Bag
product_meta.description:
TURN ANY BOWL INTO AN AIRTIGHT, LEAKPROOF CONTAINER

From the smallest cup up to the largest pots, Unwasted Silicone Stretch Lids are designed to stretch easily to fit any type or size of container to create an airtight seal for cooking, microwaving and storing food.


Saving leftovers (and the planet) is a breeze with these silicone covers

Imagine never having to hunt through your plastic container drawer in search of that elusive matching lid. Instead, you grab one of our handy expandable silicone lids and stretch over the edges of your dish or bowl and voila! You have an airtight and leakproof container.

These stretchable clear lids are real food savers too. They can be used for produce, like half of a melon or tomato, or to cover a can or cup that you want to save for later.

Cleaning and storing the lids is a breeze. Lids are made from dishwasher proof silicone and come with a free cotton storage bag so you always know where to find them.

Each set includes 7 lids to fit any container in snap:

 * 9.1 inch diameter: stretches to 12 inch diameter
 * 8.0 inch diameter: stretches to 11 inch diameter
 * 6.4 inch diameter: stretches to 9 inch diameter
 * 5.7 inch diameter: stretches to 8 inch diameter
 * 4.5 inch diameter: stretches to 6 inch diameter
 * 3.8 inch diameter: stretches to 5 inch diameter
 * 2.6 inch diameter: stretches to 4 inch diameter

Get Unwasted!

Doing your bit for the environment doesn't have to be complicated or expensive. Here at Unwasted we’ve made it our mission to make living sustainably as easy as possible.

That’s why we’re creating a range of functional and stylish products for the home and kitchen so you can reduce your reliance on plastic, go zero or low waste or just simply live a little bit greener.

Save time, money and the planet. Add to cart NOW!
feature_bullets: BEWARE FAKE SELLERS: unwasted is the only genuine, approved seller. Purchase through another brand, other than unwasted, could lead to a lesser quality product and service. unwasted uses the highest grade silicone to protect your food, includes a storage bag and cardboard - no plastic - unwasted packaging

STOP WASTING TIME LOOKING FOR THE RIGHT LID: These super stretchy covers fit any container - square or round. Unlike other brands whose sets include 6 different size lids, ours has 7 including XL. From cups, jars, dishes and bowls up to dinner plates and salad bowls

VIRTUALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE: These extra thick lids won’t tear, crack or warp like regular plastic lids. The flexible silicone cover can be used over and over again without losing its strength or shape. Lids are heat safe, dishwasher safe and microwave safe

KEEPS FOOD FRESHER FOR LONGER: The elasticized edges form an airtight, leak proof seal. Keeps prepared and leftover food fresh to prevent waste and contamination. Eliminates fridge odor. Made from BPA free silicone

SAFER, CHEAPER AND BETTER THAN PLASTIC WRAP: Unlike single-use cling wrap, these reusable lids prevent spills, won’t leach nasty chemicals into your leftovers, and reduce plastic waste. Take your kitchen from wasteful to zero waste and save money at the same time.
